ygData.subject: Re: You want to know how weak warriors! Listen to t his!
ygData.msgSnippet: In the experience with the Druid I wrote about earlier it didn t appear that group damage counted. I was a 12th warrior at the time with two rangers and a
ygData.messageBody:
In the experience with the Druid I wrote about earlier it didn't appear that
group damage counted. I was a 12th warrior at the time with two rangers and a
cleric if I remeber correctly and the three tanks coundn't outdamage that 13th
druid. It wasn't until the cleric starting using expulse undead that we ever got
experience. There may have been an undocumented fix in a patch since, but from
that experience I believe that the experience went to the single PC that did the
most damage not the group.

Just my 2cp. Hope it helps,

Surtur

PS. I still haven't gotten a response on where to look for guild links for E'ci.
Please email me with info if you have it please. Thanks all.

"Mifsud, Michael" wrote:

> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> I thought it WAS group damage vs. everyone else. i.e. allt he group damage
> was added up together then compared to the steal killers total. Thats why,
> really, only higher level wizards can steal kill. This is not the case??
